args.text: Toad stands in the dimly lit shed, surrounded by spare parts: old motors, broken propellers, and a flickering circuit board. He grins, tapping his fingers on a piece of scrap metal. The air hums with possibility.

args.description: A small RC drone assembles itself from the parts, whirring to life with a soft buzz
Toad’s eyes flash with excitement; he slaps the drone with a hand, yelling 'POOP-POOP!'
The drone takes off with a sudden burst of power, soaring upward into the sky
A pile of colorful laundry hanging to dry sways violently, then collapses with a soft crash
A paper airplane, tucked in a window, is flung into the air by the gust and crashes into a floating drone-powered airship

args.text: The airship, a whimsical vessel with sails made of old sails and a garden gnome at the helm, bounces gently as it lands. Three squirrels, a raccoon, and the serious-looking garden gnome emerge, blinking in confusion.

args.description: The raccoon adjusts his hat and squints at Toad, who is hovering near the ground, breathless
The garden gnome steps forward, his hat slightly askew, and says in a calm, firm voice: 'I have 12 laws of aerial etiquette'
Toad tries to explain, hands flailing, 'I was just having fun!'
The squirrels exchange glances, then begin a slow, rhythmic drumming on the roof with sticks
The raccoon steps forward and offers a peanut butter sandwich, placing it gently on a small plate

args.text: The drone, now buzzing with a wild energy, darts toward the power lines, attempting a looping maneuver.

args.description: The drone crashes into a transformer with a loud *crack*, sparking briefly
Everyone gasps, but the power lines remain intact, glowing faintly

scenes.name: The New Rule and Ice Cream

args.text: The group gathers in the backyard, now quiet and calm. Each brings a small pet toy: a squirrel with a tiny hat, a raccoon with a toy pipe, the gnome with a magnifying glass, and Toad with a twisted propeller.

args.description: They all look at each other, then slowly agree: 'No drones near laundry or airships'
Toad beams, receiving a special badge that reads 'Most Unplanned Mayhem'
The group gathers around a small ice cream cart. The raccoon offers a peanut butter sandwich with a smile
Phi pounces lightly on a leaf, then curls up in the grass, purring softly
